app_name: Groups Control Groups Messenger Apps CarrotChat
app_description: CarrotChat is a highly secured encrepted IM software. Based on powerful end to end encryption algorithm carrot chat can comprehensively effectively and intelligently protect user communication data. As a secure IM software CarrotChat has the following functions: Security: All communication data of CarrotChat is encrypted into ciphertext through end to end encryption technology. It is kept in ciphertext during the whole transmission process to prevent communication data from being hecked. At the same time CarrotChat also supports anti screenshot remote destruction top secret sessions and other powerful information security functions. High efficiency: Message receipt group chat bulletin board global search special attention only see someone reply and other functions make CarrotChat more efficient in information exchange and processing.
